```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

## Basic statistics

```{r}
descriptive_stats(lipidomics)
```

## Figure outputs

```{r}
ggplot(lipidomics, aes(x = value)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
```

## Convert the plot into a function

```{r}
#' Title Create Plots
#'
#' @param data Lipidomics dataset
#'
#' @return Histograms of metabolites
#'
plot_distributions <- function(data) {
    data %>%
        ggplot2::ggplot(ggplot2::aes(x = value)) +
        ggplot2::geom_histogram() +
        ggplot2::facet_wrap(ggplot2::vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
        }
```
